GSD.description:
ntfs: check overflow when iterating ATTR_RECORDs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.225 by commit b612f924f296408d7d02fb4cd01218afd4ed7184. For more details please see the references link.
